product_name: Girnar Detox Green Tea - Desi Kahwa (36 Tea Bags): Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: 7 % sodium makes it a health hazard for hypertensive patients and undo any potential good effect of other ingredients!

This is excellent. Quality of product as well as delivery was perfect. Tea tastes magnificent. Spicy, with a strong flavour of cardamom, nutmeg, clove, black pepper and black salt. I had never tasted Kahwa before, but if it is really this good, then i am dying for some more! It is unsuitable for people fond of 'Teaness'  of tea, like Darjeeling black tea, because it lacks that presence of tea aroma. However, the tea that this contains is perfect for the blending of spices and  it has its own distinct aroma. Very refreshing, energising and stress-busting. A must try, even from an experimental point of view.  Being a Bengali, have tasted a lot of Darjeeling and traditional Assamese tea, but this is absolutely unique. And Girnar has come up with a great concoction. Thank you Amazon for bringing this to my doorstep!

reviews.review_title: Fungal infected and damaged sachets. Please check before you use

reviews.review_body: I simply love this green tea. The spices in the tea completely remix the boring bland taste of usual green tea. It is a healthy refreshment and my favourite time to drink it when i am feeling sleepy due to lunch and ac effect in office. ! I have purchased 3 packs till now and my colleagues , family members who tried it have also ordered. Be cautious regarding the water quantity especially if you are making it at home. Its a perfect tea cup size. Add more its diluted, add too less it loses its perfect taste.

reviews.review_title: Terrible - Tastes like dust and spices blend without any thought!
reviews.review_body: I thought I was ordering a desi Kashmiri kahwa. Instead what I got was a terrible tea bag, which tasted like a mix of dust and some random spices thrown together. No balance, no flavour at all! No saffron either. Couldn't taste any green tea leaves in it either. PLEASE NEVER NEVER BUY THIS!

First thing comes to your mind about green tea is that it tastes bitter. But in this case it‚Äôs next to awesome. It‚Äôs a detox green tea u can call it a masala chai.. try out this one n u will fall for this green tea. Tastes best if used with warm water . Only thing is that it‚Äôs expensive but it‚Äôs worth it. After reading positive reviews I thought to give it a try so yeah I m happy with the purchase and happy with amazon services. Amazon is my fav site after Nykaa üòç

This tea helped me lot during my cough &cold.The taste of this tea quite unique and very much different from other boring green tea.. quite spicy... packaging is good.. within 3days i have received my order..thanku Amazon...if you are prone to cough and cold throughout the year.. just go for it without second thought ‚ò∫

reviews.review_title: Compromised feedback due to compromised quality
reviews.review_body: Earlier had given five stars and ordered it thrice now but this time pathetically they sent me a package which is about to expire in the next month. When the manufacturer don't compromise on the price why should we the costumers compromise on quality. Pathetically it doesn't have replace or return items chance. Otherwise I love this kahwa alot and as written in the previous feedback I would have written many more good things about this detox desi kahwa.

reviews.review_title: Tasty Tea and Good value for money.
reviews.review_body: Tea lived upto expectations.
Taste very niceI like the spice
Compared to all other brands..this is the best one can have to loose wait and get their body detox.
excellent quand on aime le th√© detox

reviews.review_title: Almost like having a cup of soup.
reviews.review_body: Between the spices, the touch of salt, and the ginger (?) in there, you feel like you're having a mug of soup. For anyone who's had South Indian food, it reminds me of the experience of drinking the top watery part of rasam. I'm not too sold on the detox situation, because my kidneys and liver do a fine job of that thank you very much. However, it is a very nice pick-me-up in the middle of the day when I'm craving a salty snack. It doesn't /quite/ satiate, but it does curb that impulse to reach for a bag of chips.
Love the slightly salty taste of this tea. Very comforting for the throat on a cold, rainy day.

reviews.review_title: Great tea. Perfect for rejuvenating yourself in a short term.
reviews.review_body: Great tea. Perfect for rejuvenating yourself in a short term. When ever I feel a little drowsy or some indigestion, I take this tea with hot water and no sweetner and this tastes great.

This is one of the best green tea I have ever had. I have tried many other green tea but has never thought of moving to green tea from real indian milk tea. But after drinking Girnar Tea I must say the flavor of spices in it just amazed me and I am slowly switing to it from milk tea. Everyone must have this one.

This tea is disgusting. I‚Äôve had many detox teas, green drinks, smoothies, etc in my life. This tea is by far the worst!! It‚Äôs what I would imagine dirty dish water to taste like. Total waste of money.

reviews.review_title: It used to be good tea.
reviews.review_body: I have been drinking this tea since last 4 years. But recently they have dropped its quality and doesn`t feel as strong as it used to be. giving it two stars.
When I first tasted this tea it reminded me of beef broth. The flavor is very good; a little peppery.

reviews.review_title: Great tea and very responsive seller
reviews.review_body: Seller: Very responsive. Corrected an issue with the order with immediate replacement.Product: This is great tasting, aromatic, and healthy herbal tea. Great for those trying to loose weight as it helps reduce appetite.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't seem to the Original, Received an Open box.
reviews.review_body: this is the first time I purchased in United States. I am having this Green Tea from last 3 years and I find a drastic difference in the authentic taste of the Desi Khava.Not sure if this is the original or there is a difference in exported quality product.
I loved the taste . Its bit salty unique  detox  tea taste  different  from other green tea.
Product was old. Contents of tea bag were seeping out of the bag. Taste was off, as if the bags were years old.
